para.text: SUTRA allows a simulation to read the initial conditions from the initial conditions file (cold start) or a previously saved restart file (warm start). A warm start is used to continue a previous simulation without any changes other than changing the time step size and increasing the simulation time.
This is the name of the restart file previously saved by SUTRA.

ISTORE controls how frequently the restart file is saved. The file will be saved when the time step is an even multiple of ISTORE or on the last time step of the simulation. ISTORE can be set to 0 to never stave a restart file.
